collection_metadata.title: Maamarim Collection - Chassidic Discourses
collection_metadata.description: Collection of Chassidic discourses (Maamarim) with Hebrew text, footnotes, and glossary. Optimized for LLM search.
collection_metadata.structure_note: Each document contains main text divided into searchable chunks, footnotes, and glossary sections
